sentences.sContent: You do not need any prior knowledge of the subject.
sentences.sCn: 你无需事先具备该方面的知识。

sentences.sContent: Changes may not be made without the prior approval of the council.
sentences.sCn: 未经委员会事先同意，不得作出改变。

sentences.sContent: Vegetarian meals are provided by prior agreement.
sentences.sCn: 经事先协商可提供素食。

sentences.sContent: Some prior experience with the software is needed.
sentences.sCn: 要求事先熟悉这个软件。

phrases.pCn: 事先批准；预先审批；事前批准；事前许可；预先核准

remMethod.val: pri(=prim第一的， 首要的) + or → 优先的

words.tran: 优先；优先权；[数] 优先次序；优先考虑的事
把事情按优先顺序排好

trans.tranOther: existing or arranged before something else or before the present situation
